SPENN.CO.summary: SPENN Technology A/S operates as a technology provider to banks and governments based on a Software as a Service solution in Denmark. The company operates the SPENN App, a digital banking platform for the unbanked, as well as the banked to send and receive money. SPENN App platform is a real-time payment system, which is used to manage savings, payments, investments, and loans. The company was formerly known as Npinvestor.com A/S and changed its name to SPENN Technology A/S in April 2021. SPENN Technology A/S is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
